5/ On the other hand, this is what # crypto growing up looks like. Crypto has to grow, has to be flooded by "noobs," if we ever want it to be mainstream.

4/ # Crypto has always lacked tolerance for new people--using the semi-pejorative term, noob--and hence it only makes sense that many of the OGs I spoke with were disheartened by the size and attendees of # Consensus2018.
2/ Yes, there was a lot of debauchery & flaunting of wealth, which stands in stark contrast to a decentralized ethos. But # crypto has become too big and diverse to claim that is *all* of crypto.
